long_description: The Gregory Z35 Pack is your go-to gear hauler for a long day on your favorite trail or exploring new terrain. Fit, features and functionality-this pack has it all. Updated CrossFlo(TM) suspension provides cooling airflow across the back, without sacrificing load transfer. Harness and waistbelt use moisture-wicking mesh to help keep you dry on these main contact points of the body. Quickdraw closure on main access; fixed top lid features a top pocket with key clip and a second stash compartment on the underside. U-shaped zippered front access to main compartment. Interior sleeve with a port for a hydration reservoir (sold separately); 2 exterior stretch water-bottle pockets. Integrated, color-matched raincover. The Gregory Z35 Pack features dual quick-access hipbelt pockets, side/bottom compression straps and hideaway axe/trekking pole loops with secure carry.
short_description: The Gregory Z35 Pack is your go-to gear hauler for a long day on your favorite trail or exploring new terrain. Fit, features and functionality-this pack has it all.
